name: compress-tag
description: Template literal tag to remove excess whitespace and newlines from strings.

scripts.check: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint
scripts.ensureCleanTree: echo 'Checking to ensure all changes are committed...' && git diff --quiet --exit-code & git diff --quiet --cached --exit-code
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run ensureCleanTree && npm run check
scripts.postpublish: cross-var git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "See changelog.md for release notes." && git push --tags && cross-var git tag -d $npm_package_version
